feed.title: Homepage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: wrapping in bookmarks by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4945
  • Fix: fix kavita API body with key by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4948
  • Fix: correct units for speedtest tracker API v2 by @brikim in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4950
  • Change: prefer IPv4 in docker image by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4954
  • Enhancement: allow disabling host checking by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4967
  • Fix: jellyfin handle empty episode numbers by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4970
  • Documentation: add HOMEPAGE_ALLOWED_HOSTS to k8s docs by @xalxnder in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4969

New Contributors

  • @xalxnder made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Chore: update minecraftstatuspinger to 1.2.2 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4982
  • Fix: fix Kubernetes stats in v1.0.0 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4984
  • Change: re-enable k8s ingress by default by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4988
  • Fix: fix bookmark heights again by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4997
  • Fix: re-add tailwind css safelist by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4999
  • Fix: fix custom quicklaunch search suggestions without search widget by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5003

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Enhancements

  • Feature: allow disable ipv6 in proxy, refactor cacheFetch to use proxy by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5011
  • Enhancement: support dynamic list rendering in custom api widget by @morliont, @shamoon and @getcursor in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5012
  • Enhancement: support shvl syntax for customapi fields by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5020
  • Enhancement: support full width container by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5021
  • Enhancement: support maximum group cols up to 8 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5022
  • Tweak: try to reduce rootless startup time by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5037
  • Tweak: change moonraker widget standby output by @ihatemyisp and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4060
  • Enhancement: Add Repositories field to Gitea widget by @chiragkrishna and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5053
  • Feature: Slskd Service Widget by @vhsdream in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5045

Fixes

  • Fix: remove medusa widget trailing slash by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5007
  • Fix: fix minecraft players after move to minecraftstatuspinger by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5017
  • Fix: include new backdrop-blur-xs option by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5030

Updates

  • Chore(deps): Bump next from 15.1.7 to 15.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5055

New Contributors

  • @morliont made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5012
  • @chiragkrishna made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5053

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.0.4...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: add fallback for shvl syntax in customapi widget by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5080

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: support shvl on customapi dynamic list target by @matheusvellone in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5081
  • Enhancement: add shvl fallback for custom api dynamic list by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5091
  • Fix: remove unneeded import from Hoarder widget.js by @vhsdream in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5097
  • Speed up CI: Skip unnecessary build steps, optimize caching etc by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5098
  • Chore: add organize imports to pre-commit by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5104
  • Chore: add more Docker Semver Tags by @RoboMagus in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5107
  • Chore(deps): Bump i18next from 21.10.0 to 24.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5109
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump postcss from 8.5.2 to 8.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5110
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-config-prettier from 10.0.2 to 10.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5112
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-config-next from 15.1.7 to 15.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5113
  • Chore(deps): Bump swr from 1.3.0 to 2.3.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5111
  • Chore: change hoarder widget to karakeep by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5143
  • Change: install iputils-ping inside docker image by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5153
  • Chore(deps): Bump next from 15.2.3 to 15.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5159
  • Fix: Longhorn still showing Total despite total: false by @kevinastone in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5200
  • Fix: kubernetes statistics not respecting selector by @xethlyx in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5199
  • Enhancement: add label formatting for dynamic-list customapi widget by @rayanmestiri in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5217
  • Enhancement: Add support for specifying a datastore to PBS widget by @choehn86 and @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4614
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5092

New Contributors

  • @matheusvellone made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5081
  • @kevinastone made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5200
  • @xethlyx made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5199
  • @rayanmestiri made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/5217
  • @choehn86 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4614

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2.0
